sentenceVariance.msg: You might be varying the length of your sentences too much. Aim to write short sentences, medium length sentences, and long sentences.

paragraphCount.msg: It is appropriate to write about 3-5 paragraphs for this writing task. You are probably not using paragraphs effectively to organize your ideas. Writing only 1 paragraph is not enough.
